scripts.dev:clean: pkill -f 'next dev' 2>/dev/null || true; sleep 2; npm run dev
scripts.dev:log: pkill -f 'next dev' 2>/dev/null || true; sleep 2; npm run dev 2>&1 | tee logs/dev.log
scripts.dev:inngest: pkill -f 'inngest-cli' 2>/dev/null || true; sleep 1; npx inngest-cli@latest dev
scripts.dev:inngest:log: pkill -f 'inngest-cli' 2>/dev/null || true; sleep 1; npx inngest-cli@latest dev 2>&1 | tee logs/inngest.log
scripts.env:check: node -e "console.log('Supabase URL:', process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL ? '‚úÖ Set' : '‚ùå Missing'); console.log('Inngest Event Key:', process.env.INNGEST_EVENT_KEY ? '‚úÖ Set' : '‚ùå Missing')"
scripts.db:reset: echo 'Run DELETE FROM auth.users; in Supabase SQL editor to reset dev database'
scripts.debug:logs: echo 'Check terminal output for Inngest logs - look for üöÄ, ‚úÖ, ‚ùå emojis'
